page.title: 03Flats
page.content: There are quite a few flats in Desborough, and some first year pupils of Montsaye school went along to find out how they lived and whether or not the occupants were satisfied with them. From the result of visiting Desborough flats we found that people were satisfied ,but minor changes could be made.Most people in flats would like more heating in bedrooms and bathrooms.Overall they were pleased with their flats but a few people would like houses and gardens of their own.Interviews showed that most people lived in flats, fewer livwd in bungalows, terraces or detatched houses. It was interesting finding out different{people's}different{opinions.
